Element.Text: The patient was in clear mental state with fast-recovering incision.

Element.Text: The patient didn’t feel comfortable today due to his bad defecation for three days, the condition didn’t get better after taking one pill of phenolphthalein and another one later. After two more pills permitted by XXX chief physician, the patient felt much better.

Element.Text: Today, the chief physician and I went on ward round. We walked into the ward, the chief physician was standing on the left side of the bed and I was standing on the other side. Both of us kept silent.

DocumentInfo.LicenseText: Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD:Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD

Element.Text: The chief physician XXX moved toward the ward in the heavy snow. He hold the patient’s hands firmly after he arrived and asked if the patient was getting better.

Element.Text: The patient has been in the hospital for two days. He is quite stable with a little bit low fever(37.5℃-38t), the arthralgia didn’t get worse. The chief physician Wang XXX went on a ward round this afternoon and checked the patient’s medical history and physical examination results. The chief physician considered that CTD including RA and SLE should be excluded based on patient’s swelling pain of big joint, subcutaneous nodules, faster ESR, ST-T in ECG as well as other negative laboratory tests results. The original diagnosis and treatment suggestions are confirmed. Start using anti-rheumatic drugs. Take aspirin 0.9g first, 3 times a day, and pay attention to gastrointestinal reactions.If there is high heat, taking prednisone 10mg, 3 times a day. In view of multiple subcutaneous nodules, patients were asked to have 24-hour urinary and uric acid tests as well as joint radiology. Anti-rheumatism treatment has been started, to closely observe the changes in the disease. Follow the instructions.

DocumentInfo.LicenseText: Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD:Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD
Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD:Lanzhou xinhaoyuan electronic technology co. LTD

Element.Text: Ward Record from Deputy Chief Physician

The patient’s dyspnea was recovering, but the whole body was in fatigue, 3020 ml of urine for 24 hours, ECG monitoring: HR: 68 times/min, not neat, a few of ventricular premature beat, BP155/70mmHg, SO298 %; physical examination: clear mental state, flat breathing, low breathing sounds from double lungs, a little phlegm, heart rate 68 times/min, audible premature beat, soft abdomen, no tenderness and piercing pain, no swelling in double lower limbs. Liver, kidney, electricity, sugar: urea *:16.25mmol/L ↑Creatinine * : 158 umol/L↑; Glucose * : 8.42mmol/L ↑; TP*: 62.0g/L↓Albumin*: 31.2 g/L↓TBIL*: 24.4umol/L↑DBIL*: 12.5umol/L↑IBIL: 11.9umol/L; GGT*: 81U/L↑; ALP*: 48U/L; ALT*:225U/L ↑; AST*:56U/L ↑; Potassium: 3.55mmol/L; Sodium: 136.9mmol/L↓; Ward round instructions from deputy chief physician Qi Lianrong showed that the patient's liver,kidney and electrolyte were improved, and the treatment was continued to reduce phlegm, protect gastric mucosa, correct electrolyte disturbance and improve heart function.

DocumentInfo.Title: disease course record 2015.10.5 10:56:38
DocumentInfo.LicenseText: Nanjing duchang information technology co., LTD 2016 beta version:Nanjing duchang information technology co., LTD 2016 beta version
DocumentInfo.Author: yfyuan

Element.Text: Normal development, moderate nutrition, clear mental state, half-lying position, supportive of physical examination. Shallow and quick breath, feeble, no visible pallor, stained yellow, cyanosis, bleeding spots and spider nevus on skin and mucosa, no swelling superficial lymph nodes. Normal head, mouth and lips, no congestion in pharynx, non-swelling tonsil, soft neck with weasand in the middle, the thyroid was not large, the bilateral jugular veins were full, and the hepatic jugular venous reflux was negative.

The chest was symmetrical and free of deformity, bilateral respiratory mobility was consistent, bilateral lung percussion was clear, respiratory tone was rough, a small amount of moist rales can be heard at the bottom of both lungs. There was no upheaval in the anterior area of the heart, no diffuse apical pulse, no enlargement in percussion, the heart tone was strong, the heart rate was 77 times/min, and no murmurs were heard in auscultatory valve area. The abdomen was flat, no intestinal type and peristaltic wave were visible, soft abdomen, no tenderness, rebound tenderness and muscle tension. The liver and spleen are unreachable, shifting dullness is negative, no abdominal vascular murmur, borborygmus exists. No spinal deformity, slight flexion of both lower limbs, inability to straighten, limited movement of both knee joints, decreased pain and temperature sensation of both lower limbs, normal muscle strength and muscle tension, limited movement of both knee joints, decreased pain and temperature sensation of both lower limbs, no edema in both lower limbs, decreased pulse movement of dorsal artery of both feet, patellar tendon reflex exists. Coronary atherosclerotic heart disease, grade III heart function (NYHA classification), pneumonia, acute cholecystitis?, type II diabetes, type II diabetic peripheral neuropathy, type II diabetic peripheral vascular disease, hypertension II (very high risk), cerebral infarction (old), BPH, chronic gastritis, malnutrition, electrolyte disturbance: hyponatremia. Treatment: 1. Examination plan: blood/urine/stool routine examination, blood gas analysis, laboratory test, blood coagulation test, thyroid function,

glycosylated hemoglobin, tumor marker, troponin T, blood sugar, ECG, chest X-ray, UCG, urinary color doppler ultrasound, abdominal color doppler ultrasound. 2. Treatment plan: monitoring ECG, blood pressure and oxyhemoglobin saturation results, oxygen inhalation, IV drip of ISDN for dilating blood vessel, improving blood circulation, anti-infection, reducing phlegm and platelet aggregation, protecting gastric mucosa, enhancing cardiac function and supporting treatment. Relatives are totally aware of the serious condition of the patient and expressed their understanding.

Element.Text: Patients with intermittent complaint of holding breath, ECG monitoring result: HR80 times/min, blood pressure 130/70mmhg, SO295%, semi-reclining position. Laboratory test result: Procalcitonin: 0.16ng/ml; Urine routine test on admission: ketone body*: negtive; N-terminal pro-brain natriuretic peptide: 17213pg/ml; Troponin T: 0.063ng/ml
Creatine kinase isozyme: 3.4U/L; Blood routine test on admission: WBC*: 7.79
10^9/L; BG+lactic acid (biochemical): lactic acid: 1.6mmol/L; PH: 7.459; PCO2: 33.1mmHg

Qi Lianrong, Deputy Chief Physician, has already checked the patient’s medical history and symptoms, all test results showed that the patient is suffering from coronary heart disease, heart failure, pneumonia, cholecystitis, electrolyte disorder, type II diabetes, so physician’s instructions are provided for dialating blood vessels, improving blood circulation, reduce cardiac load, improving heart function, anti-infection, reducing phlegm, monitoring blood sugar; Considering the community-acquired pneumonia, the patient needs the injection of piperacillin sodium which is effective for common G + and G -, anaerobic bacteria; Meanwhile, the sputum culture and drug allergy test are necessary for further medical instructions.
